version_description: Fix a potential crash during calculation.
Improve the logic to load history records.

1. Support number format in most countries.
2. Users can change the button sound settings from the 'Menu -> Preference -> Button Sound'.

1. Correct the button sound issue.
2. Add history indicator.
3. Add two new buttons under 'f(x)'
'()|': if input [5+1] then [()|] then [x3], the output expression will be: (5+1)x3
'|()': if input [5+1] then [|()] then [3x], the output expression will be: 3x(5+1)

1. Users can now change cursor positions.
Just tap on the top text view and the helper buttons will appear.
2. Fix the sound issue for the Backspace button.

1. Add 'Expression' button to the history list to reuse the expression.
2. Fix cursor issue for the backspace button.

1. Fix cursor position issue.
2. URL scheme is added.

1. Custom function is here! Define your own calculator now!
To learn how to use custom function, please check out the description of this page.
2. Fix the cursor position issue.
3. Fix a crash for saving a design to photo album.

1. Correct the order of custom functions.
2. Fix UI issues on the latest device.

1. Native suport for iPad.
2. Custom functions are now editable.
3. Correct logic after saving a equation.
4. Fix UI issues
5. Fix defects when defining a function.

1. Auto save: you can now set a timer (2-10 seconds) to save calculation automatically.
2. Support more languages.
3. Performance enhancement and bug fixes.

1. Correct cursor position.
2. Minor Bug fix
